description: Detects suspicious service installation scripts Author: pH-T. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Suspicious Service Installation Script
query: (winlog.channel:"System" AND Provider_Name:"Service\ Control\ Manager" AND winlog.event_id:"7045" AND winlog.event_data.ImagePath:*\ \/C\ * AND winlog.event_data.ImagePath:(*powershell* OR *wscript* OR *cscript* OR *mshta* OR *rundll32*))
